title: 3D Heat Equation Simulation
excerpt: GPU-accelerated real-time heat diffusion achieving 87% memory throughput and 98% GPU occupancy with CUDA-OpenGL interop for 60+ FPS volumetric rendering.
highlights: Optimized custom CUDA kernels for real-time 3D heat diffusion, achieving 87% memory throughput and 98% GPU occupancy
Implemented CUDA-OpenGL interop for real-time volumetric rendering at 60+ FPS
Profiled using Nsight Compute/Systems to eliminate bottlenecks and maximize parallel efficiency

title: Parameter Efficient LLM Fine-Tuning
excerpt: Prototyped Adaptive Sparse Fusion (ASF) framework to dynamically fuse LoRA and Prompt-Tuning for resource-constrained LLM fine-tuning.
highlights: Prototyped Adaptive Sparse Fusion (ASF) framework using PyTorch/Hugging Face to dynamically fuse LoRA and Prompt-Tuning
Conducted comparative analysis on GLUE benchmarks (MRPC, SST-2) evaluating efficiency-accuracy trade-offs
Integrated mixed-precision training (FP16) and explored Soft-MoE and Expert-Choice routing

title: Named Entity Standardization
excerpt: LLM-based standardization system using OpenAI API and RAG, deployed as Streamlit web app with semantic similarity search.
highlights: Led development of LLM-based standardization system using OpenAI API and RAG, deployed as Streamlit web app
Built NLP pipeline with data cleaning, semantic similarity search via vector embeddings, and interactive visualizations
Presented live demo to faculty and student panel, communicating technical implementation to non-technical stakeholders

title: Quantum vs. Classical ML Package
excerpt: Modular Python package comparing Variational Quantum Classifiers and Classical SVMs with 20+ functions and 100% code coverage.
highlights: Engineered a modular Python package comparing Variational Quantum Classifiers and Classical SVMs with 20+ functions
Achieved 100% code coverage across all class methods with comprehensive test suites and detailed technical documentation
